title: Random lag spikes?!
body:
Hey guys~!
Is it just me or does anyone else get random lag spikes for a few minutes every game at around the same time..? last week it happened at about 21 mins for 3 mins approx. This week it is happening at 3 mins into the game for about 3 mins. Is there any way to fix this or find out what it is? It's never done this before. I usually have 39 ping, but when the spike occurs it exceeds to about 400-500. FPS is unaffected(standard 60). This happens to me both on the new and old rift maps.
Gimme any advice/help you can~!!
Thank youu <3 ~ lag is {{champion:103}} tarded thing ._.

replies.body:
having the same issue ever since new patch.

only happens once a game.
my fps doesn't drop.
my ping can be anywhere between 300-1300
plays fine after its done the lagging
lasts for around 2-3 mins
can largely impact a game
nothing has changed in my pc settings or internet connections I run it through Ethernet Catagory5e cable directly through the modem
any enlightening on this situation would be great thanks
